name: ORDER_CONCEPT_INDEX
description: Stores a list of SmartData Value records that are stored on an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record on which the SmartData Value record IDs are stored.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number corresponding to a distinct SmartData Value record on this order.

columns.name: CONCEPT_HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the entered value for a form or note related to this order.
